text: Motion

â”€ Oh, Amana.
Good work.

Producer-san!
Good work~
Motion
Motion

I saw your post on Twesta.
Looks like you're doing something interesting.

Oh, is it perhaps
about the "Kindness Awareness Month"?

Ah,
is there a reason you started it?
That's right.

The other day, I announced on Twesta
about the radio show Amana was in.

Then,
someone commented on that post.
Is that so?

Yeah. That person, who's been busy lately,
said they hadn't been noticing kindness from others.

But after listening to the radio,
they wrote that they felt a little healed.

That made me
really happy, but...

I thought it would be nice if everyone could
start feeling more of the kindness around them together.
...That's true.
So, Amana thought I'd start by conveying that from herself.

There's a lot of kindness around us,
and Amana also gets energy from that support.

I see.
So that's why it's called "Kindness Awareness Month".
Yeah.

I hope someday "Kindness Awareness Month"
will spread to everyone~

I see...
That would be nice.
Motion
